name: NotyStack Android
desc: Fully fledged Android CRUD app based on different design patterns. Built using Java, XML, SQLite, Firebase, RoomDB, and MVVM.

name: SPPU Engg Prep
desc: All-in-one SPPU Engineering resources. Built using Java, XML, and Firebase.

name: NewsBox Android
desc: Native Android app built using Java and XML. Includes Retrofit and Glide dependencies to provide news across various categories.

name: Weatherly Android
desc: Native Android app built using Java, XML, and Volley dependencies. Provides weather forecasts.

name: Flipkart MERN
desc: Full-stack Flipkart clone with an admin dashboard and Paytm payment gateway. Built with the MERN stack.

name: ResumeGen
desc: A basic ReactJS resume generator that helps users create customized resumes in minutes.

name: React-Projects
desc: A full-stack project dashboard that showcases projects built using React.

name: Flipkart PHP
desc: Full-stack Flipkart clone built using the LAMP stack, with OTP authentication and Cashfree payment gateway.

name: JavaScript Projects Website
desc: A website to showcase all major JavaScript projects in one place.

name: Web UI Clones
desc: Flipkart, YouTube, Instagram, and SoloLearn web UI clones using TailwindCSS.

name: Crypto Tracker
desc: A crypto tracker built using ReactJS and Chakra UI, featuring dark mode and data from the CoinGecko API.

name: Hulu Website
desc: A Hulu clone website built using NextJS and TailwindCSS. Data sourced from the TMDB API and deployed on Vercel.

name: Composey Website
desc: A simple landing page built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and JavaScript libraries.

name: Webview App
desc: An Android app using the WebView component to display content, offering various features.

name: PHP Banking Website
desc: A basic banking system based on PHP and MySQL, featuring HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frontend.

name: Bootstrap Portfolio
desc: A portfolio website built using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and SCSS. Features a customized Bootstrap theme.

name: Burger Shop Dummy
desc: A basic burger shop webpage featuring a menu, pricing, and a dummy order form.
